<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[1917]]''' - [[Edith Tolkien]] writes her first letter to her husband at Thirtle Bridge army camp, near Withernsea from her new lodgings in Hornsea.  The letter was re-directed to Hornsea Musketry Camp.
* '''[[1977]] - ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: A Biography]]'' is first published in the UK.'''
* '''[[2009]] - ''[[The Legend of Sigurd and Gudrún]]'' is published.'''
